record_content_summary: Systematic creature documentation for Capital Taxonomists
fidelity_notes: High fidelity: creature locations → game spawn points. Vorn's habitat data becomes playable geography.

record_content_summary: Standard expedition routes into Dens region
fidelity_notes: Guild routes → app navigation paths. Known safe routes become player movement options.
Unmappable zones → procedural generation. Dens boundary instability becomes dynamic game terrain.
Form 17-B data → game danger mechanics. Real expedition dangers become strategic obstacles.
Three compasses → Risk-like movement. Directional limitation encoded in game movement rules.

record_content_summary: Dangerous sites that should not be visited
fidelity_notes: Proscribed sites → locked game areas. What Guild forbids becomes inaccessible game content.
Taxonomic hierarchy → creature ability trees. Scientific classification → game creature stats.
Binary naturalism → 'Half Bad' game mechanic. Two-state observation → creature behavioral mode.
Prime patterns → game turn structure. Creature cycles may influence game timing mechanics.
Yeller's fivefold nature → multi-part game creatures. Plural being → multiple coordinated game units.
Expedition deaths → game piece removal. Real casualties become strategic resource loss.
Crew catch data → game capture mechanics. Commercial trapping → strategic creature acquisition.

record_content_summary: Attractor basin mapping for Dens region
fidelity_notes: Keth's basins → game territory zones. Attractor dynamics → strategic control points.

record_content_summary: Documentation of failed deep penetration attempts
fidelity_notes: Failed surveys → procedurally generated content. What couldn't be mapped becomes dynamic gameplay.
Trade prices → game resource values. Commercial ecology → game economy.
Voss's resonance → game pathfinding. Destination paradox → fog of war mechanics.
Prebel's stability index → terrain reliability. Unstable zones → unpredictable game events.
Expedition logistics → game resource mechanics. Supply planning → strategic resource allocation.

record_content_summary: Population and settlement data near Dens
fidelity_notes: Census data → game map settlements. Village locations become strategic points.
Tross's constellations → territory adjacency. Graph structure → game region connections.
